incrementCount: MATCH (ds:data_shard) WITH ds ORDER BY ds.count ASC LIMIT 1 WITH ds SET ds.count=ds.count+1 RETURN ds
dsBelongsClass: MATCH (s:data_shard {guid:{src}}),(d:DEST_LBL {guid:{dest}}) MERGE (s)-[r:belongs]->(d) RETURN r as rid
classHasDs: MATCH (s:SRC_LBL {guid:{src}}),(d:data_shard {guid:{dest}}) MERGE (s)-[r:has]->(d) RETURN r as rid
dsBelongsOrg: MATCH (s:data_shard {guid:{src}}),(d:org {guid:{dest}}) MERGE (s)-[r:belongs]->(d) RETURN r as rid
outDsFromGuid: MATCH (s:SRC_LBL {guid:{src}})-[:REL]->(d:data_shard) return DISTINCT d as ds
inDsFromGuid: MATCH (s:SRC_LBL {guid:{src}})<-[:REL]-(d:data_shard) return DISTINCT d as ds
